nl.cwts.networkanalysis

Class LouvainAlgorithm

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.cwts.networkanalysis.CPMClusteringAlgorithm
      • nl.cwts.networkanalysis.IncrementalCPMClusteringAlgorithm
        • nl.cwts.networkanalysis.IterativeCPMClusteringAlgorithm
          • nl.cwts.networkanalysis.LouvainAlgorithm
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable, ClusteringAlgorithm, IncrementalClusteringAlgorithm, QualityClusteringAlgorithm

    public class LouvainAlgorithm
extends IterativeCPMClusteringAlgorithm
    Louvain algorithm.

    The Louvain algorithm consists of two phases:

    1. local moving of nodes between clusters,
    2. aggregation of the network based on the clusters.

    These phases are repeated until no further improvements can be made. By default, local moving of nodes is performed using the StandardLocalMovingAlgorithm.

      • improveClusteringOneIteration

        protected boolean improveClusteringOneIteration(Network network,
                                                Clustering clustering)
        Improves a clustering by performing one iteration of the Louvain algorithm.

        The Louvain algorithm consists of two phases:

        1. local moving of nodes between clusters,
        2. aggregation of the network based on the clusters.

        These phases are repeated until no further improvements can be made.

        Specified by:
        improveClusteringOneIteration in class IterativeCPMClusteringAlgorithm
        Parameters:
        network - Network
        clustering - Clustering
        Returns:
        Boolean indicating whether the clustering has been improved
